title: I couldn’t NOT show you guys this stuff - Random Tech @ Computex 2023
description:
Protect your children online! Check out Bark Parental Controls at https://lmg.gg/bark

We've looked a lot of really cool tech innovations that will probably be in your next PC build, but sometimes you just want to see some crazy tech that seems a bit ~out there.~ Alex stopped by a few booths to show you everything from RGB shoes to a PC that runs at a solid -69°C. Nice.

Check out the REZA1 RGB Shoes on StockX: https://lmg.gg/5dUx4
Buy a TEAMGROUP T-Force SIREN DUO360 AIO Cooler: https://lmg.gg/RuD0N
Check out the XPG Fusion 1600 Titanium PSU: https://lmg.gg/2zaDe
Check out the MSI Smart EV Charging Station: https://lmg.gg/oUvSj

Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at https://lmg.gg/7s34e

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW: https://lmg.gg/ltx23
► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane
► SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS: https://lmg.gg/partners
► PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET: https://lmg.gg/scset

FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE
---------------------------------------------------  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShrtCrctYT
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/shortcircuityt
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@linustech
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShortCircuitYT

CHAPTERS
---------------------------------------------------
0:00 Finally, RGB Shoes
0:44 Finally, RGB Drink Cooler
1:37 Finally, RGB SSD Cooler
2:40 Sponsor - Bark
3:17 Arx 700 Air case
3:50 XPG Fusion 1600 All-Digital PSU
5:06 MSI EV Charger?
5:31 Finally, Beer Computer
6:10 Outro

It's one of those fancy go in between places segments. I really want to have a bit of lunch. (gasping) Oh my God. They do not screw around with the spice here, just like I don't screw around with segue away to our sponsor. - Bark Parental Controls. Bark's innovative software tools allow parents to monitor their children's online activity and decrease exposure to any harmful content or dangerous situations. With advanced algorithms and machine learning, Bark scans through social media platforms, email and text messages looking for signs of bullying, violence, drug use, or other concerning behaviors. If the app detects something, it sends an alert to parents giving them the information they need to take action. The best part is that Bark's Parental Controls are easy to use. Parents simply need to sign up, connect their children's accounts, and let the app do the rest. So why wait?
